coreAttributes.name: arcane flintlock pistol
coreAttributes.description: An ancient pistol once used in a bygone era. Instead of bullets, these smoothbore pistols fire bolts of arcane energy, and a billowing cloud of arcane smoke.
coreAttributes.attackTooltipDescription: Point your flintlock pistol at [npc.name] and fire!

hitDescriptions.hitText: Aiming and firing [npc.her] arcane flintlock pistol, [npc.name] [npc.verb(manage)] to hit [npc2.name] with an arcane bullet!
Taking aim at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] arcane flintlock pistol, [npc.name] [npc.verb(pull)] the trigger, unleashing a blast of arcane energy that slams into [npc2.namePos] torso!
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(aim)] at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] arcane flintlock pistol, and, pulling the trigger, [npc.she] [npc.verb(manage)] to hit [npc2.herHim] right in the chest!
